name: xbsj-xe2

scripts.ii: echo 该命令已废弃!!!请直接执行npm install或者npm i或者yarn!!!
scripts.build: npm run postinstall && npm run build-node && npm run build-web
scripts.build-unminified: npm run build-node-unminified && npm run build-web-unminified
scripts.build-web: rimraf dist-web && npm run build-web-minified && ncp dist-web-minified dist-web
scripts.build-node: rimraf dist-node && npm run build-node-minified && ncp dist-node-minified dist-node
scripts.build-node-minified: webpack --config ./tools/webpack-node/webpack.prod.minified.js && ncp dist-node-declartions/src dist-node-minified && rimraf dist-node-declartions && ts-node tools/webpack-node/distReplace.ts -i ./dist-node-minified
scripts.build-node-unminified: webpack --config ./tools/webpack-node/webpack.prod.unminified.js && ncp dist-node-declartions/src dist-node-unminified && rimraf dist-node-declartions && ts-node tools/webpack-node/distReplace.ts -i ./dist-node-unminified
scripts.docError: typedoc --hideGenerator --readme README.md --target ES6 --module commonjs --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --excludeNotExported --excludePrivate --mode file --out dist/docs/ src
scripts.doc1: typedoc  --entryPointStrategy expand --excludeNotDocumented --exclude node_modules/**/*.ts --tsconfig tsconfig.json --hideGenerator --readme README.md --excludeExternals --excludePrivate --out dist/docs/ src/xe2/index.ts

author: vtxf, ysp
owner: 北京西部世界科技有限公司
